xcell.png xcell
2Compiling
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to \compiler\examples\(.net version)\wel\xcell\ and select xcell_demo.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Browse to Eiffel54\examples\wel\xcell\
Choose the Ace file
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click bold>OK.
2Running After launching the program, a window will be displayed. Selecting "New" from the "Game" menu or pressing F2, will cause a new game to start and the window should take a similar appearance to the above illustration. Selecting "How to play..." from the "Help" menu will display the instructions for playing the game.
2Under the Hood
This sample contains the following classes:
APP_CONSTANTS
CARD
COLUMN
GAME
GAME_CONSTANTS
GAME_MANAGER
MAIN_WINDOW
SELECT_GAME_NUMBER_DIALOG
SELECT_NUMBER_OF_CARDS_DIALOG
